label: Power Generation Equipment
description: Equipment used to generate electricity or power, including generators, turbines, and windmills.
intents: Rent a generator for an event

subcategories.label: Portable Generators
subcategories.description: Generators that are easily transportable and can be used for a variety of purposes.

subcategories.label: Wind Turbines
subcategories.description: Turbines that generate electricity from wind power.

subcategories.label: Industrial Generators
subcategories.description: Generators used for industrial purposes, such as powering large buildings or construction sites.

subcategories.label: Hydroelectric Generators
subcategories.description: Generators that use the power of moving water to generate electricity.

subcategories.label: Turbines
subcategories.description: Machines that generate power by converting the energy of a moving fluid or gas into mechanical energy.
